mapper.select: SELECT t1.rmdate,t1.rmreftyp,t2.sdate,t2.edate,t4.name,t4.imagesm,t4.acttype,t4.address,t4.actcalss from wh_comment t1, wh_actitm t2, wh_user t3,wh_act t4 where t1.rmrefid=t2.actitmid and t1.rmuid=t3.id and t2.refactid=t4.actid and t1.rmreftyp='1' and t1.rmuid=#{rmuid}

SELECT t1.rmdate,t2.enrolstime,t2.enroletime,t3.trapic,t3.tratyp,t3.arttyp, t3.agelevel,t3.tradesc,t3.tralevel FROM wh_comment t1,wh_traitm t2,wh_tra t3,wh_user t4 WHERE t1.rmuid=t4.id and t1.rmrefid=t2.traitmid and t2.traid=t3.traid and t1.rmreftyp='2' and t1.rmuid=#{rmuid}

SELECT * FROM wh_comment t1 LEFT JOIN whg_sys_user t2 on t1.rmuid = t2.id where t1.rmtyp= 1 and t1.rmpltype = 1
and t1.rmrefid in
#{item}
order by t1.rmdate desc

select c.*, u.account from wh_comment c, whg_sys_user u where rmtyp = '1' and c.rmuid=u.id
and c.rmrefid in
#{item}
order by rmdate desc
